snippet: Habib Essid served in a variety of government positions under the autocratic President Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali, who was ousted in 2011.
abstract: Habib Essid is nominated by Tunisia's leading political party Nidaa Tounes to be prime minister and is charged by party with establishing new government; Essid is American-trained economist who served under Pres Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali, as well as under interim Islamist-led government following Ali's ouster in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Habib Essid served in a variety of government positions under the autocratic President Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali, who was ousted in 2011.

headline.main: Ally of Deposed Leader Is Nominated to Be Premier of Tunisia
headline.print_headline: Ally of Deposed Leader Is Nominated to Be Premier of Tunisia
